name: Silex templates
body:
### Silex templates

These templates are released by the authors and contributors as creative commons free templates. Anyone who pushes design and HTML files in this repository agrees to this license. We invite you to use these templates for your projects.

The templates can be edited with [Silex, live web creation](http://www.silex.me), the HTML editor and website builder for designers. 

##Preview the templates

* [Minimal Grey](/silex-templates/templates/minimal-grey/)
* [about me page](/templates/lexoyo.github.io/)

##How to customize it for your website?

Download the [zip file on github](https://github.com/silexlabs/silex-templates) and unzip to a folder in your dropbox. Then [open Silex in a browser](http://www.silex.me/silex) and open the template file "editable.html".

Then insert your content, modify the design and use it for your website.

##How to contribute

These templates are made without programming, just drag and drop, with [Silex, live web creation](http://www.silex.me/). So feel free to fork this github repository, make changes and make a pull request.

Silex template by lexoyo is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
